trans-unit.source: ¿are you sure you want to exit current session?

Pausar / Continuar la sesión y la música

trans-unit.source:
Conditions of Keep The Rhythm

Keep The Rhythm uses mobile's GPS to trace your position, otherwise it can be disabled at any moment just before starting an activity by clicking onto "no gps".

Data are stored in the user's mobile, and it can be removed at any moment. Application uses data stored to show statistics and other useful information related to sport activities.

When user agrees to share his/her sport activity with others, s/he agrees to share position and listened music. Information will be stored in KML format in user’s skydrive account, by using a Public folder. Shared information will be available to other users by www.nowhereman.eu proxy server. This server will only read information on users demand, and it will never store this information.

Also, Keep The Rhythm provides a backup functionality that requires a skydrive account with a folder called “KeepTheRhythm”. This folder could be private.

In case of any doubt or question, contact the developer at no.where.man@outlook.com

Barcelona Sep-2012
trans-unit.target: Está seguro que quiere borrar todos los datos? Esta operación no se puede deshacer.

trans-unit.source: First, make sure you both have your wifi, bluetooth and NFC turned on. To start sharing just click OK.
trans-unit.target: First, make sure you both have your wifi, bluetooth and NFC turned on. To start sharing just click OK.

trans-unit.source: Now, hold the two devices back to back. You’ll hear a sound, which signifies that the devices have connected.
